title: DaveF
author: DaveF
content: Was going to open a lightning channel and took a look at the mempool to see what fees looked like.IIRC the last time we were 100+ blocks out you needed close to 100 sat/vB to get into the next block, now 20 sat/vB will do it.People finally figured out that you don't have to put in insane fees to move coins or is it just that nobody is in a rush?Found it interesting, what do others think?-Dave
